name: Frendly Hero
description:
Frendly Hero.This game is a game with a story. In this game, they kidnap your friend and you try to save your friend. This game is a 2D platform game. You are trying to save your friends by crossing the roads in the game. In the 1st part, you pass the normal track.

You try to touch the grass at the bottom in 2 chapters and in the last chapter you shoot the kidnappers and save your friend and you become a friendly hero. MEMOLI games wish good games
